    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdvanceOrder
    This class represents an Advance Order in the game.
    AirliftOrder
    This class represents an Airlift Order in the game.
    AssignReinforcements
    Phase for making deplay orders
    BlockadeOrder
     
    BombOrder
    This class is used to implement the data and logic of how to execute bomb order given by a player.
    Cards
    Enum class containing all possible cards and the logic of assigning random cards.
    Commands
    This class is used to store all the possible commands and some syntax.
    Continent
    This is the continent class, it contains the structure of a Continent to be used in the WarMap, it also contains the army bonus to be used during the game.
    Country
    This class describes information about each country, including the contained armies and neighbouring countries.
    DeployOrder
    This class is used to implement the data and logic of how to execute orders given by a player.
    Edit
    Abstract class to be inherited by phases in the map editor
    GameEngine
    The GameEngine class represents the startup phase of the game.
    GameMenu
     
    IssueOrders
    Phase for issuing orders
    LogEntryBuffer
    This class contains utility functions for creating and editing maps to be used in the game.
    LogWriter
    This class contains utility functions for creating and editing maps to be used in the game.
    Main
     
    MainMenu
    Phase for the main menu
    MapEditor
    This class contains utility functions for creating and editing maps to be used in the game.
    Observable
    Class that implements the connection/disconnection mechanism between observers and observables (subject).
    Observer
    Interface class for the Observer, which forces all views to implement the update method.
    Order
    This class is used to implement the data and logic of how to execute orders given by a player.
    OrderExecution
    Phase for executing orders
    OrderPhase
    Phase to be inherited by different phases that occur during the order phase
    Phase
    Base phase class to be inherited by all other phases
    Play
    Phase class to be inherited by all phases involved in playing the game
    Player
    This class describes information about each player and the order that were issued using the logic present in the same class.
    Postload
    Map editing phase for after a map has been loading
    Preload
    Map editing phase for after a map has been loaded
    Startup
    Phase for starting up gameplay
    WarMap
    This class describes information stores a WarMap to be used in the game, it's main use is to store the countries, continents and adjency list of neighbouring countries It also contains the functions for validating, saving and showing the game map.
